root.name: Eternal Poison
root.description: Story The recently engaged princess Lenarshe of the Valdia kingdom has been kidnapped by the demonic Majin. The King Valdus declares to grant the wish of anyone who can get his daughter back.Gameplay The Majin can be captured in battle (the bosses as well) and either summon them to use in battle or extract poison and skills from them. SoundtrackThe music for Eternal Poison was composed by Takashi Okamoto and Yuki Nakagawa. A soundtrack was included with the US release.
